scripts.update-answer-data: npm run update-answer-data:locator:coord && npm run update-answer-data:locator:element && npm run format
scripts.update-answer-data:locator:coord: UPDATE_ANSWER_DATA=true MIDSCENE_USE_QWEN_VL=1 npm run evaluate:locator && npm run format
scripts.update-answer-data:locator:element: UPDATE_ANSWER_DATA=true npm run evaluate:locator && npm run format
scripts.update-answer-data:planning:coord: UPDATE_ANSWER_DATA=true MIDSCENE_USE_QWEN_VL=1 npm run evaluate:planning && npm run format
scripts.update-answer-data:planning:element: UPDATE_ANSWER_DATA=true npm run evaluate:planning && npm run format
scripts.update-answer-data:assertion: UPDATE_ANSWER_DATA=true npm run evaluate:assertion && npm run format
